abstracts.value: We explicitly construct the four and two fermion zero modes for the mixed-flux generalization of the Hofman-Maldacena giant magnon on two of the AdS$_{3}$ backgrounds with maximal amount of supersymmetry, AdS$_{3}$×S$^{3}$×T$^{4}$ and AdS$_{3}$×S$^{3}$×S$^{3}$×S$^{1}$. We also show how to get the $ \mathfrak{p}\mathfrak{s}\mathfrak{u}{\left(1\Big|1\right)}^4 $ and $ \mathfrak{s}\mathfrak{u}{\left(1\Big|1\right)}^2 $ superalgebras from the semiclassically quantized fermion zero modes.

We explicitly construct the four and two fermion zero modes for the mixed-flux generalization of the Hofman-Maldacena giant magnon on two of the AdS$_3$ backgrounds with maximal amount of supersymmetry, AdS$_3 \times$S$^3 \times$T$^4$ and AdS$_3 \times$S$^3 \times$S$^3 \times$S$^1$. We also show how to get the $\mathfrak{psu}(1|1)^4$ and $\mathfrak{su}(1|1)^2$ superalgebras from the semiclassically quantized fermion zero modes.
